pr_title: NF: calls ids2String without useless conversions

timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: THe inital goal was to add the element directly. I then realized it would really not work and so changed and added it in the set of values
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: This is clearly a mistake. I just wanted to remove conversion. thanks
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

timeline.bodyText: Ditto - and this needs regression coverage, as the breakage wasn't caught.
timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.message:
